wikipedia_page.main: Joel Thomas Pilkington (born 1 August 1984) is an English footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ramsbottom United. He made four substitute appearances in the Football League whilst playing for Burnley.

response: O'Neill attended Mount Carmel RC High School in Accrington along with fellow professional footballers Joel Pilkington and Richard Chaplow. He is the brother of former Preston North End, Bury, Mansfield Town and Chester City professional footballer Joe O'Neill, and also Ed O'Neill. In March 2014, the brothers made history in the 8–1 win for Nelson over Widnes Vikings, being the first three siblings to score in the same game in the North West Counties Football League.
